name: John (Doomerismo)
description:
You are a guy trapped in a room and have to choose the actions of another guy named John.

Game made for GAMinG Jam! in one week. I had no time to implement audio, screens and in-game tutorial.

CONTROLS:

ARROWS - Walk

WASD - Look around

Space - Interact

1 / 2 - chose action

You have to be facing the computer to pick a choice option.
